thread.title: Hey Falcons Fans (And Everyone Else), Here’s A Patriots Fan Fracturing His Leg Celebrating A Touchdown
thread.title_full: Hey Falcons Fans (And Everyone Else), Here’s A Patriots Fan Fracturing His Leg Celebrating A Touchdown

author: Douglas Charles
title: Hey Falcons Fans (And Everyone Else), Here’s A Patriots Fan Fracturing His Leg Celebrating A Touchdown
text:
Twitter

Patriots fans are (once again) loving life while most of the rest of us are left wondering what the hell we have to do in order for our favorite team to win a freaking Super Bowl .
This guy, however, is probably not enjoying life nearly as much as most Pats fans today. 
Watch as he gets so fired up over a New England touchdown that he slams his shin into a coffee table, putting a premature end to his overzealous celebration.
When your boy fractures his leg when the #patriots score. #sctop10 #scnottop10 #fcmailbag pic.twitter.com/jvR6zwb4kT 
— SMASH Global (@Smash_Global) February 6, 2017 

Does that make you feel any better, Falcons fans? ( Especially after seeing this .) I know I certainly feel better.
